scripts.posttest: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:e2e: npm run pretest && npm run test && npm run posttest
scripts.test:allure: npm run test && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:run: cypress run --browser chrome --headed --env allure=true,allureResultsDir=allure-results --record false && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report --port 0
scripts.test:report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report --port 0
scripts.test:auto: cypress run --browser chrome --headed --env allure=true,allureResultsDir=allure-results --record false && sleep 2 && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report --port 0
